architectural_notes: Ensure category-filter query is disabled/skipped unless a real category is selected; avoid calling category API with empty string that overwrites base room list in React Query.
known_issues: Rooms do not appear on initial load unless a category is selected; empty-string category filter request returns zero rooms and overwrites base list in React Query.

existing_features.title: Fix the lobby initial-load bug where chatrooms do not display until a category is selected by ensuring the category-filter React Query never shares the base chatroom query key when no category is selected (so it cannot overwrite the base ['chatrooms'] cache).

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix lobby: show rooms on initial load by preventing category-filter query from running when no category is selected (avoid empty-string category call overwriting base list)

projectName: Fix lobby initial load: prevent empty category filter from overwriting chatroom list
